EmailTemplate.name: Ambassador Notices
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Want Exclusive SALT Swag?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}:
Join the #SALTsquad to help spread information about SALT’s resources on social media and earn some exclusive SALT swag! All you need to do is post about SALT four times a month, and we'll send you new swag each month.
The first item up for grabs is a SALT hoodie. Post about SALT on social media four times, and it’s yours!
We’ll send you sample social media language you can use, or feel free to create your own. Email ambassador@asa.org to by Friday, 2/26 to get started.
